elements.text: You are driving with a friend in your car, and you pass the scene of a car accident. You start to feel queasy as you think about a future when you will no longer be able to drive safely. Your friend reminds you that that future is...

elements.name: Car Accident_Presymptomatic_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
